title: Split
desc: Split is a mobile-first progressive web application aimed to help divide and track expenses among peers. Built using NextJS and MongoDB, and hosted on vercel.

title: Spacegram
desc: A gallery of space pictures fetched from the NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day. Boasts search,like & share features.

title: The Rick List
desc: A database of Ricks across universes. Maintained by the Council of Ricks!
